title: Construction/Lamp duration

properties.name: description
properties.value: The duration in which burners stay lit are random and depend on the player's Firemaking level. The duration is '"`UNIQ--postMath-00000001-QINU`"' ticks, in which '"`UNIQ--postMath-00000002-QINU`"' is a random number between 0 and '"`UNIQ--postMath-00000003-QINU`"'[1].

content:
Burn duration[edit | edit source]

The duration in which burners stay lit are random and depend on the player's Firemaking level. The duration is 200 + f i r e m a k i n g L e v e l + A {\displaystyle 200+firemakingLevel+A} ticks, in which A {\displaystyle A} is a random number between 0 and f i r e m a k i n g L e v e l − 1 {\displaystyle firemakingLevel-1} [1].

  • At level 50, a burner would last between 250 and 299 ticks (150-179 seconds).
  • At level 85, a burner would last between 285 and 369 ticks (171-221 seconds).
  • At level 99, a burner would last between 299 and 397 ticks (179-238 seconds).

Burners will not stay lit when all players have left the house. However, if there are other players in the house when the owner leaves through the entrance portal; they will stay lit as long as the owner returns to the house within 5 seconds.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 16 October 2018. (Archived from the original on 28 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "200 cycles + your FM level + random number between 0 and your FM level, inclusive of 0 but not inclusive of your FM level. Really. So at level 70 that'd be 200 + 70 + (random number 0-69 inclusive), i.e. between 270 and 339."
rawContent:
==Burn duration==
The duration in which burners stay lit are random and depend on the player's [[Firemaking]] level. The duration is <math>200 + firemakingLevel + A</math> ticks, in which <math>A</math> is a random number between 0 and <math>firemakingLevel - 1</math>{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1052120197103005696|date=16 October 2018|archiveurl=https://archive.is/Sh8NI|archivedate=28 May 2020|quote=200 cycles + your FM level + random number between 0 and your FM level, inclusive of 0 but not inclusive of your FM level. Really.
So at level 70 that'd be 200 + 70 + (random number 0-69 inclusive), i.e. between 270 and 339.}}.

*At level 50, a burner would last between 250 and 299 ticks (150-179 seconds).
*At level 85, a burner would last between 285 and 369 ticks (171-221 seconds).
*At level 99, a burner would last between 299 and 397 ticks (179-238 seconds).

Burners will not stay lit when all players have left the house. However, if there are other players in the house when the owner leaves through the entrance portal; they will stay lit as long as the owner returns to the house within 5 seconds.
